channel.title: Hi, I'm Justin Woodbridge. I Make Raffle Creator
channel.description:
Hi guys, I'm [Justin Woodbridge](http://justinwoodbridge.com).
I run [Raffle Creator](https://rafflecreator.com) in my free time, a tool that helps schools and other non-profits fundraise their for their raffles online and manage all the details (keeping track of entrants, printing tickets, running the drawing).
Glad you guys made this place, hope to stick around, learn a lot, and contribute in anyway I can!

item.title: Hi, I'm Justin Woodbridge. I Make Raffle Creator

item.description:
Hi Justin. Nice niche you’re carved out there!

Read full topic

item.title: Hi, I'm Justin Woodbridge. I Make Raffle Creator
item.dc:creator: paulyoder
item.description:
Thanks for introducing yourself Justin and sharing about your app.

I’m curious, how long have you been working on Raffle Creator and what marketing channels have worked well for you?

Read full topic
